= Updates and upgrades to MacFusion and its plug-ins =

[http://code.google.com/p/macfusion/wiki/CHANGELOG Changelog]

= MacFusion 1.0 (2007-04-22) =

Publicised at the [http://www.sccs.swarthmore.edu/users/08/mgorbach/MacFusionWeb/ MacFusion home page]. Reference from that page to release 1.0 (and other *RELEASES*) [http://code.google.com/p/macfusion/issues/detail?id=85 may] overlap with less publicly available *BETAS*. 

As we have two communities of users — (1) those using releases and (2) those using betas between releases — it is *extremely important for all issue reports to state version numbers and other information required for [http://code.google.com/p/macfusion/wiki/quick quick fixes]*.

1.0 [http://code.google.com/p/macfusion/issues/detail?id=62&can=2&q=downloads#makechanges may] be added to the [http://code.google.com/p/macfusion/downloads/list Downloads] area.

== MacFusion 1.01 B1 (2007-04-27) ==

Posted less publicly to the [http://groups.google.com/group/MacFusion-devel/browse_frm/thread/1cfcf158cbf11e1d MacFusion-devel Google Group discussions area]. 1.01 Beta 1 [http://code.google.com/p/macfusion/issues/detail?id=62&can=2&q=downloads#makechanges may] be added to the [http://code.google.com/p/macfusion/downloads/list Downloads] area (labelled _Deprecated_ to reduce prominence).

== MacFusion 1.1 Beta 2 (2007-05-11) ==

Released publicly within our Downloads area and featured on our [http://code.google.com/p/macfusion/ Project Home page].

== Updates and upgrades to the MacFusion application ==

[http://www.sccs.swarthmore.edu/users/08/mgorbach/MacFusionWeb/features.html Version 1.0] uses [http://sparkle.andymatuschak.org/ Sparkle] for self-update functionality. Discussion of Sparkle-oriented 'appcasts', through which announcements and deliveries will occur, began on [http://code.google.com/p/macfusion/issues/detail?id=74 10th May 2007].

== Updates and upgrades to filesystem plug-ins for MacFusion ==

Discussion began on [http://code.google.com/p/macfusion/issues/detail?id=40 5th May 2007].

= Persistence of this wiki page =

Subject to closure of the discussions mentioned above, this page may at some point in the future be removed.
